definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: strength, force, violence, alw. [[בְּחָזְקָה]] with strength, force, etc.;—
of oppression Ju Jdg 4:3 forcibly, violently; capture by force 1Sa 2:16; Ez Eze 34:4 of ruling [[וּבְפָָּרֶח]] ´[[בְּח]] with force and with rigour.
rebuke severely, sharply Ju Jdg 8:1; cry mightily, insistently Jon 3:8.—[[לֲחָזְקָה]] 2Ki 12:13 v. [[חָוַק]]
